articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Last surviving Bali bomber's apology rejected by victims - The Star Online
articles.description: The last surviving bomber in the Bali blasts that killed more than 200 people two decades ago has expressed regret for the deadliest terror attack in Southeast Asia ahead of its 20th anniversary on Wednesday, but victims have rejected his apology.

articles.title: Ringgit slips further against US dollar at close - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The ringgit slipped further against the US dollar at the close today in line with most Asian currencies, as the greenback continued to strengthen its appeal as a safe haven currency, an analyst said.
